script.title: Good work!
script.body:
Our algorithm is adjusting its recommendations based on your interactions.

Don't forget to use the like, share, and bookmark buttons to give the algorithm a signal of what to prioritize.

script.title: Great!
script.body:
We use the data we're collecting about you to make some assumptions, but these aren't always accurate.

Seeing what data we collected might help you understand how we got there:

script.title: Got it.
script.body:
There can be a mismatch between the signals the algorithm picks up on and what we think they mean.

We want to try something new and share the data we have on our users' preferences which go into these profiles. Click continue to see yours:

This is based on your interactions, which signal to us your engagement with different types of content.

Here's how we've been weighing them:

What if you could control these weightings? You can drag the bars above to change what the algorithm values more.

On the upcoming screens, we try to be more transparent, too; click the menu on the bottom left to see the data we collect on you in real time.

script.title: New Feature
script.body:
We hope that providing some transparency on how we're interpreting your interactions and what data we collected can help you engage with our app with greater control.

We're experimenting with a new feature where you can select from a number of algorithms to use in our app.

Here's a sneak peak of some examples of what these algorithms can look like.

script.title: Thanks for helping us make our app better!
script.body:
